price: Qabeenyi isaatiifi wanti inni hores isa hin fayyanne.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhu māluhu wamā kasaba
